timeline.message:
Update the description of eth1-deposit-contract-address

fixes #3284

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

timeline.bodyText:
hmm, not sure "Generally" is a particularly good term here. Maybe:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                      "Contract address for the deposit contract. Generally defaults if network has been specified.",
          
          
            
                      "Contract address for the deposit contract. Only required when creating a custom network.",
timeline.author: ajsutton
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -21,7 +21,8 @@
   @Option(
       names = {"--eth1-deposit-contract-address"},
       paramLabel = "<ADDRESS>",
-      description = "Contract address for the deposit contract. Required if eth1-endpoint is set.",
+      description =
+          "Contract address for the deposit contract. Generally defaults if network has been specified.",
